dirnode.name: Deployment Manager Groups
dirnode.property: Deployment Manager can target machines returned by the queries you create in this folder.

node.name: 1st_half_cms
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'cms%1' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'cms%3' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'cms%5' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'cms%7' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'cms%9' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: 1st_half_mmugw
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'mmu%1' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'mmu%3' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'mmu%5' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'mmu%7' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'mmu%9' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: 1st_half_omu
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'omu-au%1' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'omu-au%3' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'omu-au%5' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'omu-au%7' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'omu-au%9' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: 1st_half_proxy
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'proxy-au%1' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'proxy-au%3' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'proxy-au%5' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'proxy-au%7' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'proxy-au%9' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: 1st_half_tag
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'tag-au%1' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'tag-au%3' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'tag-au%5' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'tag-au%7' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1' or INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'tag-au%9' and INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'cms%' and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: All_DSU1a_Cluster1
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'dsu1a%' and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: All_DSU1b_Cluster1
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'dsu1b%' and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: All_DSU2a_Cluster2
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'dsu2a%' and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'dsu2b%' and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: All_DSU3a_Cluster3
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'dsu3a%' and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: All_DSU3b_Cluster3
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'dsu3b%' and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: All_Linux_DataIP
node.property: select MANAGEMENT_IP as MACHINE_NAME,DATA_IP, DATA_HOSTNAME,MANAGEMENT_HOSTNAME from INV_DATA_MANAGEMENT_NETWORK

node.name: All_Linux_Dynamic
node.property: select distinct inv_network.address machine_name, rpcport, rpcsslport, inv_machine.name from inv_machine, inv_tuner, inv_network where inv_machine.id = inv_tuner.machine_id and inv_machine.id = inv_network.machine_id and inv_network.address != '127.0.0.1' and inv_network.address not like '%.1' and rpcport like '7717'

node.name: All_Linux_No_CMS
node.property: This query is used for installing Oracle client v9 instead of v10.

SELECT distinct n.address machine_name FROM inv_machine m, inv_network n, inv_os o, inv_tuner WHERE o.machine_id = m.id AND n.machine_id = m.id AND m.id =inv_tuner.machine_id AND UPPER(o.product) LIKE '%LINUX%' AND n.address NOT IN ('0.0.0.0', '127.0.0.1') and rpcport like '7717' and (m.name like 'vm-asu%' or m.name like 'omu-au%' or m.name like 'tag-au%' or m.name like 'proxy-au%')

node.name: All_Linux_machines
node.property: This query is used by deployments in SDM to idenify Linux based machines in the array.

SELECT distinct n.address machine_name, m.machine_domain, inv_tuner.rpcport, inv_tuner.rpcsslport FROM inv_machine m, inv_network n, inv_os o, inv_tuner WHERE o.machine_id = m.id AND n.machine_id = m.id AND m.id =inv_tuner.machine_id AND UPPER(o.product) LIKE '%LINUX%' AND n.address NOT IN ('0.0.0.0', '127.0.0.1') and rpcport like '7717'

node.name: All_MMTV
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'mmtv%' and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: All_MMU-GW
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'mmu-gw%' and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: All_OMU-AU
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'omu-au%' and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: All_PROXY-AU
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'proxy-au%' and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: All_SMU1a
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'smu1a%' and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: All_SMU1b
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'smu1b%' and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: All_Solaris_machines
node.property: This query is used by deployments in SDM to idenify Solaris based machines in the array.

SELECT distinct n.address machine_name, m.machine_domain, inv_tuner.rpcport, inv_tuner.rpcsslport FROM inv_machine m, inv_network n, inv_os o, inv_tuner WHERE o.machine_id = m.id AND n.machine_id = m.id AND m.id =inv_tuner.machine_id AND UPPER(o.product) LIKE '%SUN%' AND n.address NOT IN ('0.0.0.0', '127.0.0.1') and rpcport like '7717'

node.name: All_TAG-AU
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'tag-au%' and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: All_VM-ASU
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'vm-asu%' and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: All_LVU
node.property: select distinct INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR as machine_name from INV_TUNER, INV_MACHINE where INV_TUNER.MACHINE_ID=INV_MACHINE.ID and INV_MACHINE.NAME like 'lvu%' and INV_TUNER.RPCIPADDR!='127.0.0.1'

node.name: All_local_Agents
node.property: Verify the content of your system here !

select min(inv_network.address) machine_name, min(rpcport) as rpcport,inv_machine.name from inv_machine , inv_tuner, inv_network where inv_machine.id = inv_tuner.machine_id and inv_machine.id = inv_network.machine_id and inv_network.address != '127.0.0.1' and inv_network.address not like '%.1' and rpcport like '7717' group by inv_machine.name

node.name: All_tuners
node.property: select distinct inv_network.address machine_name, machine_domain, rpcport, rpcsslport, inv_machine.name from inv_machine, inv_tuner, inv_network where inv_machine.id = inv_tuner.machine_id and inv_machine.id = inv_network.machine_id and inv_network.address != '127.0.0.1' and rpcport like '%7717'
